awd_titl_txt: Group Travel to Attend: The 1985 IEEE International         Symposium on Information Theory, June 23-28, 1985
awd_abstract_narration: Support is provided to enable young researchers to attend and to                participate in the IEEE International Symposium on Information Theory.          The program includes five invited plenary session lectures and several          special sessions of invited papers with the topic, VLSI and information         theory, being highlighted.  The meeting will offer the opportunity for          young and experienced investigators to interact.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division of Microelectronic Information Processing Systems
